sentences.sContent: The technique Mr. Wilson uses most often is to juxtapose things for dramatic effect.
sentences.sCn: 威尔逊先生最常用的技巧是把事物并列起来以获得戏剧性效果。

remMethod.val: juxta(接近) + pose(放) → 挨着放 → 并放， 并列

trans.tranOther: to put things together, especially things that are not normally together, in order to compare them or to make something new
